test.data: This file has 1 Chinese character, encoded using a hexadecimal numeric character reference. It is a gb2312 encoded file with no non-ASCII characters (i.e. it is also an ASCII or iso-8859-n file).
The XML header of this file is <?xml encoding="gb2312"?>.
The character is here: [中]. It is the Chinese character for middle. It should look like a box with a vertical line through its middle.
